text: In the nitrogen cycle, the nitrates in the soil are converted to atmospheric nitrogen by
explanation:
In the nitrogen cycle, the conversion of soil nitrates back into atmospheric nitrogen is called denitrification. This process is carried out by certain bacteria, especially in anaerobic (oxygen-deprived) conditions like waterlogged soils, where they use nitrates as an electron acceptor during respiration instead of oxygen.

text: When sickle cell carrier marries a normal woman, the probability of them having a normal offspring is
explanation:
A sickle cell carrier (AS) and a normal woman (AA), when crossed will yield:
2 normal offsprings (AA) and 2 sickle cell carrier (AS).
Hence, the probability of a normal child = \(\frac{2}{4}\)
= \(0.5\)

text: The part of the mammalian ear responsible for the maintenance of balance is the
explanation:
Your inner ear has three main parts: your cochlea, semi-circular canals (labyrinth), and your vestibule. Your cochlea supports your hearing andyour vestibule and semi-circular canals support your balance.
